Summary._: Southbound [C] trains express from Hoyt to Bway Junction because a train's brakes were automatically activated at Lafayette and we are investigating the cause.

LongDescription:
Southbound [C] trains are running express from Hoyt Schermerhorn to Broadway Junction because a train's brakes were automatically activated at Lafayette Av and we are investigating the cause.

Expect delays in [A] and [C] train service.

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 17 - 20, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6] trains run express from Hunts Point Av to Parkchester in the Bronx


For service to Whitlock, Elder Avs, Morrison Av-Soundview and St Lawrence Av, take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 17 - 20, Tue to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Norwood-bound [D] trains run express from Stillwell Av to 9 Av in Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 17 - 20, Tue to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM Norwood-bound [D] trains run express from Stillwell Av to 9 Av in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 17 - 20, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Norwood-bound [D] trains run express from Stillwell Av to 9 Av in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Bay Pkwy and 62 St.

No Norwood-bound service at Bay 50 St, 25, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, 55, 50 Sts and Fort Hamilton Pkwy.

For service to Bay 50 St and 25 Av, take the [D] to Bay Pkwy and transfer to a Stillwell Av-bound [D].

For service to 20 Av, 18 Av, 79 and 71 Sts, take the [D] to 62 St and transfer to a Stillwell Av-bound [D].

For service to 55, 50 Sts and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the [D] to 9 Av and transfer to a Stillwell Av-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to 62 St, Bay Pkwy or Stillwell Av and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 16 - 20, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Church Av, Newkirk Plaza and Kings Hwy.

For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J, Avenue M, Avenue U and Neck Rd, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza, Kings Hwy or Sheepshead Bay and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [B]* or [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
